tool.name: StrainDesign simulate-deletion
tool.description: Search genes to delete in a biological model
tool.command: python -m straindesign simulate-deletion @CMD_INPUT_MODEL@ @CMD_INPUT_PATHWAY@ @CMD_INPUT_MEDIUM@ @CMD_BIOMASS_RXN_ID@ @CMD_TARGET_RXN_ID@ --strategy '$input_strategy.strategy' #if str($input_strategy.strategy) == 'ko': --substrate-rxn-id '$input_strategy.substrate_rxn_id' #if $input_strategy.annotate: --email '$__user_email__' #end if #end if #if str($max_time_cond.max_time_param) == 'yes': --max-time '$max_time_cond.max_time' #end if --max-knockouts '$max_knockouts' --output-file-tsv '$output_tsv'

param.name: substrate_rxn_id
param.label: Substrate reaction ID
param.help: Reaction ID contains no special characters

param.name: annotate
param.label: Annotate the genes
param.help: Please agree to use your email for query the NCBI website to annotate the genes

param.name: max_knockouts
param.label: Number of items deleted to consider
